name: Generic Zombie Shooter - Redux
description:
Generic Zombie Shooter - Redux is a remake of the 2013 "Generic Zombie Shooter", which was my first game. It's a top-down wave-based zombie shooter that's continuing to become less generic. 

All artwork assets are from the original game and will be remade towards the end of the project.

All feedback and suggestions for improvement are appreciated!

Controls
